original: 本為割據關中的地方軍閥。建安十六年與馬超、韓遂一同起兵反曹，潼關之戰敗給曹軍後便加入曹魏。曹丕即位後，尚有討伐賊亂的記載。
text: This was a local warlord who ruled Guanzhong. In the 16th year of Jian'an, he joined forces with Ma Chao and Han Sui to fight against Cao. After the battle of Tongguan was defeated by Cao Jun, he joined Cao Wei. After Cao Pi came to the throne, there are records of crusades against thieves.
